summary: My fiery redhead, Meera, as a standalone follower.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma][size=4][u]Summary[/u][/size][/font]

Hi there,

I've had a few requests asking for my character, Meera, to become a standalone follower. So after much procrastination and trial and error, here she is. She can be found in the Winking Skeever, I hope you'll treat her gently.

This is my first mod aside from some simple Creation Kit edits, I apologize if there're any issues.

[u][size=4]Follower Info[/size][/u]

Name: Meera
Race: Nord
Voice: Young Eager
Body: Sevenbase, UNP, UNPB, CBBE
Default Armor: Leather
Default Weapon: Steel Sword
Location: The Winking Skeever, Solitude
Both marriable and essential.
She is a spellsword, specializing in one-handed weapons and Destruction/Restoration magic.

[size=4][u]Required Mods[/u][/size]

You'll need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url] or XPMSE for any BBP versions, or you will CTD.

[size=4][u]Issues[/u][/size]

[list][*][size=2]I was not able to get permission for the texture pack I was using, so I had to find an alternative. As a result she may look slightly different compared to the screenshots, but I feel like these textures come very close to what I had, if not slightly better.
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]She won't have her chest tattoo like in the screenshots, I don't know how to package it in a standalone mod. I don't feel like it makes too much difference though.
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]She may look different in your game depending on the ENB you're using.[/size]
[/*]
[/list]
[u][size=4]Videos

[youtube]C7p45tUERqU[/youtube][youtube]SF9c3nVTV4g[/youtube]
[/size][/u]
[size=4][u]Recommended Mods[/u][/size]

One of the follower overhaul mods([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]EFF[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]AFT[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO[/url])
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url]

[u][size=4]Mods used in screenshots[/size][/u]

Kinematic ENB
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41470/?]Poupouri ENBs - Extended[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60261/?]Facial Expressions Project (F.E.P)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49979/?]Rutah Tattoo Pack[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59202/?]Sotteta Necromancer Outfit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61013/?]Emfy Cleric Robes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?]TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim[/url](ShadowFang)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59579/?]Narilda Armor[/url]
Chaperonins Reuse
Katarina Armor

[u][size=4]Credits[/size][/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu by Expired[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP UNPB and SeveNBase - WIP by Zonzai and Seren4XX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55761/?]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for CBBE by drunkenmojo[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18717/?]Temptress Race by Psychos1s and Brokefoot[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows by Hello Santa[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416/?]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr Dave[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT by Blessed Redux Project team[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60243/?]WellGram Warpaints - RaceMenu Overlay Plugin 2.0 by Aydoo[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania by tetrodoxin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25673/?]Tutorial - Creating Standalone NPCs by Natilde[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33106/?]Standalone Followers Tutorial by zzjay[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3191463/?]Sniizy[/url] (Thanks for your help)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3970139/?]VRDaphni[/url] (Thanks for the fix and info)
KS Hairdos 265

[u][size=4]Last Words[/size][/u]

Any mod listed above without a link means it's not available on the Nexus.
As I said, this is my first real mod, please let me know if you find any issues, I'll try fix 'em ASAP.
Enjoy and please upload tons of screenshots :)
author: Syphoid

files.name: Meera - Standalone Follower CBBE
files.changelogHtml:
Cleaned some dirty edits in both main and optional files
Fixed a bug that was causing purple eyes with certain ENBs - Thanks to VRDaphni for the fix
Removed some unneeded files
